New Records: Heinrich Klaasen scored 81 off 46 balls, the highest score in the series
Key Match Events: India managed only 148 for six in 20 overs
Heinrich Klaasen's superb 81 off 46 balls made it a walk in the park for the Proteas
Pre-Game Insights: South Africa won the toss and opted to bowl first
Temba Bavuma said they will have a bowl first and don't know how the wicket will play
Rishabh Pant said they would have bowled first as well and the track is really nice
Post-Match Reflections: Heinrich Klaasen's innings was a walk in the park for the Proteas
Bhuvneshwar Kumar's fantastic figures of 4 for 13 were not enough to save the day for India
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at Barabati Stadium was a bit two-paced and had a fair bit of grass, but didn't seem to grip too much
The par score was expected to be around 160-170
